(registered 2013-09-06, last updated 2013-09-06)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.bluetooth.le.oob

Required parameters : None.

Optional parameters : None.

Encoding considerations : binary

Security considerations :
This data is recommended to be transported over an interface that protects 
against Man-In-The-Middle attacks and is encrypted.

The media type contains no executable or active content.

Interoperability considerations :


Published specification :
The Bluetooth Core Specification v4.0 that is publicly available here: 
https://www.bluetooth.org/docman/handlers/downloaddoc.ashx?doc_id=229737. 
If portions of the specification only are necessary to gain approval for the 
requested mime type, please contact us and we will make the appropriate 
section(s) available.

Applications which use this media :
Bluetooth SIG LE Pairing application

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : None
2. File extension(s) : LE
3. Macintosh file type code : None
4. Object Identifiers: None

None

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Mark Powell
2. Email : mpowell&bluetooth.com

Intended usage : Common
None

Author/Change controller : Mark Powell, Executive Director, Bluetooth SIG, Inc.
